title: Game crashes entire computer?
body:
IDK what it causing it but I've already tried repairing the client and factory resetting my computer but everytime I get into a game after loading screen my entire computer seizes up and just straight freezes. 

My specs: 8gb RAM, Intel Core i7-5500U CPU @2.40ghz, Windows 10 Home 64-bit (10.0 14393 build), and Intel HD Graphics 5500.

Ive run the game on even worse computers before without issues. The issues only seemed to crop up with the new windows 10 update that auto-installed, not sure if this is caused by an issue with League/Windows or not.

Step by step about how it occurs is

1. Log-in
2. Join game
3. Champ Select
4. Loading screen
5. In-game about to buy
6. Computer seizes up entire require a reset via holding power button

EDIT: Ive been able to run other video games just fine, this issue only crops up with league currently.

replies.body: Appears ive found a workaround in playing in Windowed Mode, it doesnt crash anymore but not having fullscreen is a bummer when I try to go back to Fullscreen it crashes my computer.
I wasn't even aware of the windows 10 anniversary updated, but I am running windows 10 with automatic updates, and now in the last week LOL has suffered hard crashes like this 3 times.
thank you guys. i have not been able to play league for 2 months. the xbox solution works perfectly

I've been seeing a fair amount of reports that the Windows 10 anniversary update has caused a number of issues with League. I recommend rolling that update back by moving to an older build and see if it resolves your issue as it did with *Kaab*. 

If you continue to see issues, please let me know.
